question: 理解する
sourceMnemonic: <ja>理解</ja> is understanding, so the verb version would be...? How about <vocabulary>to understand</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to comprehend</vocabulary>? Well, do you?
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Of course, if you know <ja>理解</ja> already this one is easy <vocabulary>to comprehend</vocabulary>.
